definition: having separated or advocating separation from another entity or policy or attitude, an advocate of secession or separation from a larger group (such as an established church or a national union)
details:
adjective
- having separated or advocating separation from another entity or policy or attitude
= synonyms: breakaway
noun
- an advocate of secession or separation from a larger group (such as an established church or a national union)
= synonyms: separationist
